thread.title: Untouchable: New Photos From Next Week’s The Flash
thread.title_full: Untouchable: New Photos From Next Week’s The Flash

author: Silas Lesnick
title: Untouchable: New Photos From Next Week’s The Flash
text:
SHARE Check out new stills from The Flash 3×12, “Untouchable” 
The CW has released the first photos for next week’s episode of The Flash ! In the gallery viewer below, you can check out more than a dozen shots from episode 3×12, “Untouchable”. 
RELATED: Kid Flash Gets Trained and the Legends Head to 1776 in New Series Promos 
“Untouchable” is set to air Tuesday, February 7 with the following official description: 
Barry and the team at S.T.A.R. Labs work together to bring down Clive Yorkin (guest star Matthew Kevin Anderson), a criminal meta-human who is methodically killing people by causing them to decompose at an accelerated rate. Joe becomes his next target but it’s Iris who is caught in the crossfire. The Flash mentors Kid Flash and begins to elevate the newer speedster’s training to another level. 
“Untouchable” is directed by Rob Hardy from a screenplay written by Brooke Roberts & Judalina Neira. 
The Clive Yorkin character was introduced in the original DC Comics was back in 1979’s The Flash #270 in a story called “A Fast Way to Die”. 
RELATED: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend’s Rachel Bloom Wrote a Song for The Flash Musical Episode 
The Flash stars Grant Gustin as Barry Allen / The Flash, Candice Patton as Iris West, Danielle Panabaker as Caitlin Snow, Carlos Valdes as Cisco Ramo, Tom Cavanagh as Dr. Harrison Wells, Jesse L. Martin as Detective Joe West, Keiynan Lonsdale as Wally West (aka Kid Flash) and Tom Felton as Julian Albert. 
The Flash airs Tuesday nights on the CW at 8:00pm ET/PT, followed by DC’s Legends of Tomorrow at 9:00pm. 
Have you been enjoying The Flash season three so far? Will you be tuning in for “Untouchable” next week? Let us know your thoughts in the comments below!
